data.title: Bibliograph
data.meta_description: An open data platform that grows library visibility through a collaboration of thousands of libraries and their service providers. Our mission is to build new pathways to libraries on the Web. Together, we share structured data and connect people with the books they want to read.
data.text:
Краткое содержание

Ex-member of the International Brigades during the Spanish Civil War, Dr. David Foster, a distinguished neurosurgeon, returns to Spain thirty years later for a medical conference. On the ruins he once fought, the modern city of Barcelona has sprung up. Foster goes searching for Maria, a nurse who nurtured him back to health after he was wounded in battle. Instead of finding Maria, the doctor encounters her daughter who looks just like her mother. Despite Foster's attempts, the clock of time just can't be turned back
